title: The story behind Plant Based News with Co-Founder Robbie Lockie
description:
Episode 24 is all about Plant Based News with Co-Founder Robbie Lockie.

Plant Based News has quickly grown to become one of, if not the, most visited websites on the internet for the latest plant based & vegan news. The entire platform is aimed at making people more conscious with regards to the environment, their health and the other living beings that we share the planet with. Their mission and goals are so well aligned with Plant Proof's that I couldn't miss out on the opportunity to have Robbie on the show to hear just how things have unfolded for him personally and for this amazing media company he founded with his business partner Klaus Mitchell.

In this episode we discuss:


Robbie's childhood in Zimbabwe & why he moved to London

Robbie's passion for media

Robbie's transition to a vegan lifestyle

The inspiration & team behind Plant Based News

What the future holds for this company

and much much more


REVIEW/SHARE:
If you enjoyed the episode and have a spare 1-2 minutes please leave a review on iTunes so the Plant Proof podcast ranks higher and becomes more discoverable for other listeners. And if you have any friends that you think will benefit from listening to this episode or any of the other Plant Proof episodes please share the link – together we can make this world a healthier place.

WHERE TO LISTEN TO THE PLANT PROOF PODCAST?
Currently, the Plant Proof podcast can be listened to on iTunes, Google Play, Spotify, Stitcher, Soundcloud or on the Plantproof.com directly. If you listen on iTunes be sure to hit ‘subscribe’or ‘follow’ on Spotify so you are instantly notified when I release new episodes each week.

I hope you enjoy the episode.

Simon Hill
